lockdown template example

2025-04-10

Source: vignettes/examples/lockdown.Rmd
lockdown.Rmd
Thanks for using lockdown, your antivirus really appreciates it.
This is a friendly reminder that this template is intended as a joke and not to be used in production !

It seems that you want to get out of this page...

Please remember to :

  • wash your hands
  • wear a mask
  • keep your distances
  • avoid crowded and poorly ventilated indoors
  • keep yourself informed with sources based on good science

Stay safe !

What’s this ?

lockdown is a not-so-fond tribute to the not-so-lovely year 2020 and its Covid-19 pandemic.

The main and only feature of this template is to add a warning on external links, so that each time you want to get out, you’ll get a friendly reminder of the things to take care about to stay safe.

You can test it by, for example, clicking this wonderful link.

Take care !

Developed by Julien Barnier.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
